; test a couple i-type instructions.
; not as extensive as r-type since they only differ by one mux
; also test nops and dependencies
000000000000 00001 111 00001 0010011 ; andi x1, x1, 0
111111111111 00010 100 00010 0010011 ; xori x2, x2, -1
000000000100 00011 001 00011 0010011 ; sll x3, x3, 4
000000001010 00100 000 00100 0010011 ; addi x4, x4, 10
000000000000 00000 000 00000 0010011 ; nop 
000000000000 00000 000 00000 0010011 ; nop
000000000000 00000 000 00000 0010011 ; nop
111111111110 00100 000 00100 0010011 ; addi x4, x4, -2 - dependency
; expected register values
; x1 = 0
; x2 = 0xFFFFFFFFD
; x3 = 0x30
; x4 = 12
